author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two workers of Sri Dhandayuthapani Swamy Temple here were suspended in connection with a suicide by a pilgrim on the hill temple here on Sunday.

The temple sources said that the suspended workers were electrician Ramesh and security staff Ram Bhagadhur. These persons were holding the terrace gate key, sources added. Relatives of the deceased received the body from Dindigul Government Hospital after post mortem and took it to their native place.

Chandraksekaran (35), a mason from Thanjavur, committed suicide by hanging on the terrace of the hill temple on Saturday.
title: Two temple workers suspended
